articles.title: Microsofts Aurora AI Revolutionizes Weather Prediction Accuracy
articles.summary_short: Aurora AI by Microsoft predicts hurricanes, typhoons, and air quality with unmatched speed and accuracy. Is your weather forecasting ready for this AI leap?
